summary: This document is a declaration by Emily Paxton, the custodian of records for American Express, in response to a Grand Jury Subpoena dated July 11, 2019. It certifies the authenticity of records provided in compliance with the subpoena, affirming they were created in the regular course of business.

persons.name: Emily Paxton
persons.context: Emily Paxton declares her position as the custodian of records for American Express and certifies the authenticity of the records provided in response to a Grand Jury Subpoena.

persons.name: Alex Rossmiller
persons.context: Alex Rossmiller is mentioned as the signatory of the Grand Jury Subpoena requesting records from American Express.

events.title: Grand Jury Subpoena Issued
events.description: A Grand Jury Subpoena was issued requesting specified records from American Express.

events.title: Declaration Executed
events.description: Emily Paxton executed a declaration certifying the records provided in response to the subpoena.

keyFacts: Emily Paxton is the custodian of records for American Express.
The declaration certifies the authenticity of records provided in response to a Grand Jury Subpoena.
The subpoena was issued on July 11, 2019, by Assistant United States Attorney Alex Rossmiller.
The declaration was executed on March 17, 2021.
